column2:
"Listen, you're making a deadly mistake if you
think these guys are just like the ones you
smacked down before."

"When you get to be an ARKS member of my
caliber, you learn to pick and choose
your battles carefully."

"So right, I'll just stay here and
watch you on the monitor like always!
Well, best of luck!"

"ほら、前戦ったやつと
姿が似てっからって油断して
痛い目見んのも嫌じゃんか？"

"オレくらいのアークスになると
こんな風に、用心に用心を重ねる
もんなのよ。"

"てことで、いつも通りおたくを
モニターさせてもらおうかなってな！
そんじゃ、よろしく！"
